name: shannabarnard.com
body:
# Welcome.
I'm a front-end developer passionate about UI development and a background in UX. Specialising in HTML5, CSS3, JS and Responsive development.

### Personal Information
 +44 (0)7729 133 686
 | <shannabarnard@gmail.com>
 | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/shannabarnard)
 | [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/shannabarnard)
 | [GitHub](https://github.com/shannabarnard)
 
### More about what I do
My portfolio site with attached CV and full employment history can be found here: [shannabarnard.com](http://shannabarnard.com/). 

Otherwise you can [download](shannabarnard.com/demo/ShannaBarnardCV_2016.pdf) a PDF copy of my CV.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
